Name: Redemption: Saints And Sinners
About the game: Squad of professional soldiers was sent to scout distant space station. After the accident, that station were evacuated long ago and all the exits were blocked with power shields. But the incoming signal from there made the Commander concerned. Squad's ship were fired upon and the survivors woke up at the station. Solve puzzles and discover space station Try to survive against aggressive monsters Use the most powerful weapons Feel yourself in the role of a Space Marine
